name: Root Clicker
description:
Get to work kid! No time to be waiting for these roots to grow and make me some of that coinage!! We need to move ahead on our journey.

INSTRUCTIONS!

Buy trees and plot them, harvest and buy UPGRADES and try to make enough coinage to get that sweet new car.

Only played with a mouse. 

Hat (Farmers wit)= More time to collect ready plants and dead plants give more coinage

Suit (Coinage craft) = Gives more coinage from harvested plants 

Improved Mulch = Faster growth (Not dead plants) 

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/root-idle-2

Coder- Count-X

Artists- DaddyElkys, MikkoM, Kurpitsa, Kinomi

Music By Leevi and Onni of Stadin ammattiopisto
